required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SaRS-Cov-2 Antibodies Following Exposure to Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) and/or Vaccination in Nursing Homes
clinical_study.official_title: SaRS-Cov-2 Antibodies Following Exposure to COVID-19 and/or Vaccination in Nursing Homes

brief_summary.textblock:
Presence of SaRS-Cov-2 antibodies following exposure to Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) and/or vaccination is a major indicator of immunization. Few data exit about serology response in nursing homes (NHs), i.e. in the most vulnerable population for developing severe forms of the disease.
Residents and health professionals in 9 nursing homes (NHs) with SaRS-Cov-2 antibodies detection after exposure (either COVID-19 or vaccine) All biological tests were performed in the frame of the standard care of residents and health professionals and all participants did not express opposition for using anonymously their data for the purpose of this academic analysis. In addition all Directors and Physicians of these NHs accepted to participate in this study

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion average 6 months Retrospective analysis
primary_outcome.description: Study of the SARS-COV-2 antibodies according to the history of COVID-19 and vaccinal status in Nursing Home residents and in health professionals

intervention.description: Analysis of the results of the serological response to COVID-19 and/or Vaccine

study_pop.textblock: Residents of the 9 Nursing Homes that participate in this study Health professionals working these Nursing Homes

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
For Residents:
- Living in one of the 9 Nursing Homes that participate in this study
- Having a SARS-COV-2 post vaccination serology.
- Having no objection for using the results of the serology for the purpose of this analysis
For Health Professionals:
- Working in one of the 9 Nursing Homes that participate in this study,
- Having a SARS-COV-2 post vaccination serology.
- Having no objection for using the results of the serology for the purpose of this analysis
Exclusion Criteria:
- None

responsible_party.investigator_title: Athanase Benetos, Clinical Professor, Head of the Dpt of Geriatrics

patient_data.ipd_description: The database can be used by other groups but only for academic purposes
